channel.title: Why cant others or me connect to my server using hamachi? with the hamachi IP!
channel.description:
i compile then run my server.....
then ppl are on my hamachi...
and they try to log in with my hamachi ip and it says server is down
it does the same thing with me...
do u need to change something in hamachi????????????
plz help :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 06:17:29 PM[/size][hr]help please im so close to getting my server up!

item.title: Why cant others or me connect to my server using hamachi? with the hamachi IP!
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Good luck getting it to work while you’re using Hamachi. Hamachi barely works for anyone I know that plays on Private Servers.

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant others or me connect to my server using hamachi? with the hamachi IP!

item.title: Why cant others or me connect to my server using hamachi? with the hamachi IP!
item.dc:creator: @billy00 billy00
item.description:
@billy00 wrote:

Do you have the runserver up so they can log into your server? Do you even have a server for them to go on? If you don’t it will give them an error.

Read full topic
